reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app does declare the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions that the application may acquire various types of data about the user.
reply.reference: The anonymous information that we (the developers) may acquire about you includes: IP address; installation country (matched to the IP address); device manufacturer and model type, as well as the operating system and version running on your system or device; and language. These are sent to ensure they are transmitted correctly. URL: https://barzah5.wixsite.com/mathematicstrainer

source_documents.excerpt:
PRIVACY POLICY FOR THE "MATHEMATICS TRAINER" APPLICATION
MAY 12, 2020
This Personal Data Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the Privacy Policy) applies to all information that the "Mathematics Trainer" application, available in the App Store, may acquire about the User during the use of the said application.
Our "Mathematics Trainer" application, hereafter simply referred to as the application:
- Does not contain in-app purchases, other than those specified in the App Store.
The anonymou...

developers make decisions about optimal methods for launching the applications they have created for you. For example, the developer may need to know the types of devices on which the application is launched to determine how to support the application's update on an ongoing basis.
We are not liable for any consequences of using our application, the occurrence of malfunctions in devices, or their breakdowns.
Our privacy policy may change from time to time. We will post any changes to the Privacy ...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The application collects anonymous information such as IP address, installation country, device manufacturer, device model, operating system version, and language.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the types of data collected by the application, ensuring transparency with users.
reply.reference: The anonymous information that we (the developers) may acquire about you includes: IP address; installation country (matched to the IP address); device manufacturer and model type, as well as the operating system and version running on your system or device; and language. URL: https://barzah5.wixsite.com/mathematicstrainer

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use by stating that the developer utilizes system data to ensure the correct transmission of information and to make decisions about the optimal methods for launching and updating the application.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly mentions that the application collects system data to function correctly and make informed decisions regarding the application's launch and support.
reply.reference: Using these system data, the application developer has continuous access to this data. This collection and use of data allows the application to function as expected. These reports are partially based on your actions but do not contain specific information about you or your device. The reports described in this paragraph help developers make decisions about optimal methods for launching the applications they have created for you. URL: https://barzah5.wixsite.com/mathematicstrainer

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: No, the user cannot opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy does not mention any provision for users to opt out of data collection or delete data, indicating that these options are not available.
reply.reference: Our privacy policy may change from time to time. We will post any changes to the Privacy Policy on this page. URL: https://barzah5.wixsite.com/mathematicstrainer
